column4: hi all, can anyone explain me the difference between the desktop and server edition? what does the server have/lack in comparison with the desktop edition?
server edition is supposed to be used on server where you don't need desktop environment
are the packages different built? or is it just a smaller install? and what about long term support?
LTS is for versions that were marked LTS (6.06 and now 8.04 will be)
